characteristics: Tangerine, orange, cinnamon aroma, marmalade flavors
storability: Retains 80%-85% alpha acid after 6 months storage at 20ºC (68ºF)
style_guide: Porter, English Bitter, Wheat Beer, Celtic Ale, Summer Ale, Amber Ale, Dark Amber Ale, India Pale Ale, Imperial India Pale Ale
substitutes: Willamette, East Kent Golding, Styrian Golding
resistant_to: Resistant to powdery mildew and verticillium wilt
name: First Gold
